. Gartner says Gmail has captured less than 1% of the enterprise e-mail market, counting only businesses with at least 100 paid seats. Managed services partners are jumping on board, though. A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program, says an MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained`` more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers.''

SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.'' Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

`` We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it.'' Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. In his U.N. presentation, Colin Powell described it as Terrorist Poison and Explosive Factory, Khurmal. Donald Rumsfeld said Khurmal was operated by Ansar al-Islam, a Sunni militant group with ties to Abu Musab al-Zarqawi , a Jordanian extremist with ties to the al-Qaida terrorist network. Leaving denouncement of his church`` sermon'' to others, John Archibald tentherism in his inaugural address earlier that day as equally`` unnecessary, divisive and blind.'' As he notes, it was, after all, Martin Luther Day in Montgomery. It was the inaugural, the same event George Will Wallace used in 1963 to wave his` segregation forever' fist at the federal government. Bentley's words that day`` burn like a bad memory,'' and a worse testament to a seminal American legacy. Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him, Ed Miliband said. The government is pushing through harsh spending cuts to tackle a record budget deficit.
